name: Merrell Moab Adventure Chelsea Polar Waterproof Boots - Men's
categories: Moab Adventure Chelsea Polar Waterproof Boots
description: Blending style and traction, these boots build the classic Chelsea profile, atop Merrell’s grippy Moab tread. No matter what type of terrain your day throws at you, the Moab Adventure Chelsea boots will help you keep the rubber side down.Waterproof, full-grain leather uppers and Waterproof M Select™ DRY, seals out water and lets moisture escape.Insulated with M Select™ WARM lightweight 100g insulation.Soft fleece lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Kinetic Fit™ removable contoured insole for flexible support.EVA midsole adds a stabile comfort.Nylon shank offers all-day support.Vibram® outsole for traction in all weather and temperature conditions.
